summation_rule: Expenses are typically debit balances (positive). Sum them algebraically.
additional_instructions:
Finance costs for Neoscience currently include only interest on lease liabilities as per Ind AS 116.

GL Details:
- Int on LL (Interest on Lease Liability): This represents interest expense on lease obligations recognized under Ind AS 116

The 'Interest expense on:' line is a category header with no amount. Include cross-reference to note 37 for lease liabilities details.

If the company has other finance costs in future periods (such as term loans, equipment loans, banker's acceptance, etc.), they should be added as separate line items under this note.
